content.rendered: Hey everyone! Check out this Twitch Stream: https://www.twitch.tv/esaygraphics. Eric is generously working on graphic designs for Daggers High!

excerpt.rendered: Hey everyone! Check out this Twitch Stream: https://www.twitch.tv/esaygraphics. Eric is generously working on graphic designs for Daggers High!

jetpack-related-posts.title: Promotion- Twitch and Westmont Public Library
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: Hey everyone- just thought I'd inform you all that Eric Say will be streaming more graphic design for Daggers High on his Twitch Steam tomorrow (November 10th, Sunday)! Please follow his Twitch stream if you would like to follow along: https://www.twitch.tv/esaygraphics/videos/all The stream will likely take place at 8 AM Central…

jetpack-related-posts.title: Purchase Daggers High on The Game Crafter
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: Hi everyone! I thought that I would just take a moment to share the new progress I've had with Daggers High. You may be aware that Daggers High recently launched and failed on Kickstarter. Although this was disappointing, I still wanted to find a way to get Daggers High into…

jetpack-related-posts.title: Kickstarter Day Seven: Student Discounts, Kicktraq, and Disabled Ad Account
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: Hi everyone! It's been a while since I last posted one of these. In fact, an entire week has gone by! Wow, it's crazy to think that I've been managing this project for so long. Anyway, I just wanted to share a few things about the status of the project.…

jetpack-related-posts.title: Featured in Meeple Critic
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: https://www.meeplecritic.com/anticipated-board-games-2019/ Hey everybody! I came across this article recently and was very happy to find Daggers High listed as number 16 on this list! One thing that is very neat about Board Game Geek is the subscribe feature, which notifies me whenever somebody says something about the projects I follow…

jetpack-related-posts.title: Tabletop Simulator
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: Hey everyone! I put Daggers High on Tabletop Simulator recently. I don't know if this will actually work because I have never used it before, but you can take a look here: https://steamcommunity.com/workshop/filedetails/?id=1631560486 You'll need to buy Tabletop Simulator, which is $20 off of steam but only like $10 from…

jetpack-related-posts.title: Official Rulebook
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: Hey everyone! Over the past few days I have been writing up an official rulebook for Daggers High. I ended up choosing to use LaTex to make the rulebook because it's simple and clean, and doesn't require too much graphical design work. Plus, I already knew how to use LaTex…
